short_summary: Installation of argon gas piping infrastructure
description: To install argon gas piping infrastructure with a length of 800m to transport argon gas from the main tank to the 4th and 7th floors of a building, including all necessary labour, materials, and equipment. The work must be carried out with a workmanlike manner and in a continuous and expeditious way to complete the project to the satisfaction of the Owner.

* **Services Required**: Installation of 800m Argon piping infrastructure for transport of Argon gas from the main tank to the 4th and 7th floors of the main building
* **Additional Requirements**:

	+ Laboratory equipment installation and testing
	+ Close coordination of construction activities with building management and affected areas
